title: My client is not opening
body: My (updated) client started to say that it couldn't connect to the internet so I restarted my router, restarted my computer, relaunched the client, etc. All of this did not solve my problem so I decided to delete and reinstall my client but when I tried to open the client it wouldn't open. I keep clicking it and the "League of Legends" title appears but after that nothing happens, there is not even a loading symbol on my dock (I have a mac btw). What should I do to fix this?

replies.body: We experienced some live service issues yesterday that may have caused this. These issues have since been resolved, so please let me know if you're still experiencing this.
